hint: Apply early filtering to dimension tables before joining with large fact tables, push predicates into CTEs, and materialize intermediate results to reduce join cardinality.
Isolate filtered date and item dimensions into separate CTEs to enable predicate pushdown and reuse filtered dimension sets before joining with fact tables.
Pre-filter both dimension tables into CTEs, then pre-join them with the fact table in a staged CTE to minimize intermediate data, and consolidate computations.
Transform query structure by splitting potential OR conditions, converting set operations to EXISTS patterns, and decorrelating any hidden subquery patterns for better join planning.
